amendment.description: To increase the amount of substantial improvement to a property that triggers the loss of flood insurance subsidies.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2698 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2698 proposed by Senator Blunt.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2698 proposed by Senator Blunt.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2698 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
